column4: ok the person i am trying to connect to with ssh has forwarded port 22 but i keep getting connection refused
is there a step i am missing?
does the server hosting the ssh connection have its gateway enabled?
he wouldnt know and yes its running ubuntu
this is as long as DCHP is not being enabled
root is disabled by defualt i thought
it does the same with their username as well
yes i can ssh to my shell   and ykfff yes i have the pass for the root on that system
Permission denied (publickey,password). thats what he gets
and he used his correct username?
does your friend have a ~/.ssh  directory?
if not,  have him type ssh-add
